function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Testing viral enrichment process in sewage samples can pose a risk of exposure to viral contaminants.","Impact":"Potential spread of viral contaminants among researchers and staff, leading to infection and illness.","Mitigation":"Follow strict biohazard safety protocols when handling sewage samples and use appropriate personal protective equipment.","Technologies":"Biohazard safety equipment, fume hoods, and containment procedures for handling potentially infectious materials.","People":"Researchers, laboratory staff, and anyone in contact with the sewage samples.","Owner":"Laboratory management, biosafety officers, and health and safety personnel."},{"Description":"Handling sewage samples without proper pasteurization increases the risk of exposure to live viruses.","Impact":"Potential transmission of live viruses from sewage samples to individuals, leading to infection.","Mitigation":"Use adequate pasteurization protocols to inactivate viruses before handling samples, and strictly adhere to biosecurity guidelines.","Technologies":"Pasteurization equipment, biosecurity protocols, and monitoring of inactivation processes.","People":"Researchers, laboratory staff, and anyone in contact with the sewage samples.","Owner":"Laboratory management, biosafety officers, and health and safety personnel."},{"Description":"Testing and quantifying viral titers in wastewater samples involves the risk of accidental exposure to SARS-CoV-2 virus.","Impact":"Potential transmission of SARS-CoV-2 to researchers and staff during sample handling and testing.","Mitigation":"Implement strict handling and testing protocols, use appropriate personal protective equipment, and follow containment procedures to minimize the risk of exposure.","Technologies":"Personal protective equipment, biosafety cabinets, and containment procedures for handling potentially infectious materials.","People":"Researchers, laboratory staff, and anyone in contact with the sewage samples.","Owner":"Laboratory management, biosafety officers, and health and safety personnel."}]}
